articles.description: Matt Weston produced a stunning run to make more history in Cortina as he became the first Briton to win two gold medals at a Winter Olympics with a thrilling victory in the mixed team skeleton event alongside Tabitha Stoecker.
articles.title: Matt Weston and Tabitha Stoecker win thrilling mixed team skeleton gold at Winter Olympics

articles.description: Arsenal score four goals in the opening 30 minutes as they cruise past Wigan to reach the FA Cup fifth round for the first time in six years.
articles.title: Arsenal 4-0 Wigan: Fast-starting Gunners cruise through to FA Cup fifth round

articles.description: After weeks of debate about whether Pakistan's fixture against India would go ahead at the T20 World Cup, the action failed to deliver and it left the rivalry feeling more political than sporting.
articles.title: T20 World Cup 2026: 'India vs Pakistan becoming a political rivalry rather than sporting one'

articles.description: France were at their swaggering best in Wales to extend their bid for a first Six Nations Grand Slam since 2022 - so who could stop them?
articles.title: Six Nations 2026: Will anybody deny flowing France a Grand Slam?

articles.description: BBC Scotland looks at Youssef Chermiti's impact for Rangers against Hearts and beyond.
articles.title: The curious case of Youssef Chermiti in Danny Rohl's Rangers revolution

articles.description: After a weekend of FA Cup action without VAR, BBC Sport ask managers, fans and pundits whether the game needs technology - and what needs to change.
articles.title: The big VAR debate: with, without or change its scope?

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Birmingham City vs Leeds United in the FA Cup
articles.title: Birmingham City vs Leeds United: FA Cup stats & head-to-head

articles.description: An Olympic gold medal on snow has long seemed like the impossible for Team GB. But for those in the know, it has been just a matter of time.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026: Why Team GB gold on snow has been a long time coming

articles.description: Interim manager Martin O'Neill says the current side's fighting spirit reminds him of his previous Celtic glory years after their comeback win in Kilmarnock.
articles.title: Celtic spirit reminds Martin O'Neill of spirit of Parkhead glory years

articles.description: Renee Regis continues in father John Regis' footsteps by winning the women's 200m title at the UK Athletics Indoor Championships in Birmingham.
articles.title: UK Indoor Championships: Renee Regis adds to family legacy with 200m gold
